data.eml:eml: A new species of Kamimuria (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from the Russian Far East

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Teslenko, Valentina A. (2006): A new species of Kamimuria (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from the Russian Far East. Zootaxa 1307: 55-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173792
